title: getAllMetrics — getAllMetrics
text: Compute various metrics given set samples function processes data.frame containing sample information, including paths necessary files, computes variety metrics sample. required metrics include number cells, specificity FDR, number transcripts per cell, transcripts per area segmented cell, transcripts per nucleus, signal noise ratio, fraction transcripts segmented cells, Mutually Exclusive Co-Expression Rate (MECR), sparsity, Shannon entropy. data frame must include columns: sample_id, platform, expMat, tx_file, cell_meta.

code: plotMetrics(   metrics_list = NULL,   PlotAutocorr = T,   PlotSparsity = T,   PlotEntropy = T,   PlotClusterSilhouette = T,   ncol = 14,   nrow = 1,   rel_widths = c(0.75, 0.4, 0.5, 0.3, 0.3, 0.3, 0.3, 0.3, 0.3, 0.3, 0.75, 0.75, 0.8, 0.3,     0.8, 0.8) )

title: plotMetrics. — plotMetrics
text: metrics_list list containing metrics results. PlotAutocorr Logical; TRUE, plots autocorrelation metric. Default TRUE. PlotSparsity Logical; TRUE, plots sparsity metric;Default TRUE. PlotEntropy Logical; TRUE, plots entropy metric; Default TRUE. PlotClusterSilhouette Logical; TRUE, plots cluster silhouette metric; Default TRUE. ncol Integer; number columns plot grid; Default 14. nrow Integer; number rows plot grid; Default 1. rel_widths Numeric vector; relative widths columns plot grid.

title: plotMetrics. — plotMetrics
text: plot object created cowplot::plot_grid.

title: readSpatial. — readSpatial
text: readSaptial reads data either Xenium, CosMx, MERSCOPE outputs seurat object common metadata e downstream comparison.

title: readSpatial. — readSpatial
code: readSpatial(sample_id, path, platform = NULL, seurat = FALSE)

title: readSpatial. — readSpatial
text: sample_id Identifier sample processed. path file path load spatial transcriptomics data. platform platform data originates. Valid options 'Xenium', 'CosMx', 'Merscope'. Note: 'Merscope' currently supported. seurat Return seurat object .

title: readSpatial. — readSpatial
text: Returns Seurat object containing loaded processed spatial transcriptomics data, including sample metadata, cell metadata, embeddings tissue coordinates. structure content returned object vary depending platform.

title: readSpatial. — readSpatial
text: Reads preprocesses spatial transcriptomics data specified path given platform. function supports 'Xenium' 'CosMx' platforms, performing platform-specific loading preprocessing steps. includes loading data, annotating sample metadata, processing cell metadata. 'Xenium', adds additional cell metadata tissue coordinates embedding custom plotting. 'CosMx', fixes assays separate targeting non-targeting probes, adds additional cell metadata, includes tissue coordinates embedding. 'Merscope' platform support development.

title: readTxMeta. — readTxMeta
text: reads transcript localization/metadata table. platform, table used subsequent functions.

title: readTxMeta. — readTxMeta
text: path file path read transcriptome metadata. platform platform transcriptome metadata read. Valid options 'Xenium', 'CosMx', 'Merscope'. Note: 'Merscope' currently supported.

title: readTxMeta. — readTxMeta
text: Returns data table transcriptome metadata. 'Xenium', 'feature_name' column renamed 'target'. 'CosMx', transcriptome file matching '*tx_file.csv.gz' read. return value 'Merscope' stops execution error message.

title: readTxMeta. — readTxMeta
text: #' function reads transcriptome metadata specified path, depending platform specified. Currently supports 'Xenium' 'CosMx' platforms. 'Xenium', reads 'transcripts.csv.gz' renames 'feature_name' column 'target' consistency. 'CosMx', reads appropriate transcriptome file matched '*tx_file.csv.gz'. 'Merscope' platform support development.
